abilities.name: Force Power: Influence
abilities.description: The character may spend :forcepip: to stress the mind of one living target they are Engaged with, inflicting 1 strain. In the character spends :forcepip: and succeeds on the check, they can force the target to adopt an emotional state or believe something untrue, lasting for 3 rounds or 15 minutes.

abilities.name: Force Power: Move
abilities.description: The character can hurl objects by making a Move power check and rolling a ranged attack as part of the pool. The attack’s difficulty is equal to the silhouette of the object being thrown (default is silhouette 0) and only succeeds if they can also spend enough :forcepip: to move the object. The attack deals damage equal to the object’s silhouette times 10 (silhouette 0 deals 5 damage) plus 1 per net :success:. To throw multiple objects, they must generate enough :forcepip: to move multiple objects, and must use rules for Auto-Fire to determine difficulty and targeting.

abilities.description: When a character is within Short range of Dengar they may suffer 2 Strain to add automatic :advantage::advantage: to Streetwise and Knowledge: Underworld checks they make that turn.

abilities.name: Dirty Tricks
abilities.description: Once per encounter as an action, Dengar may make a :hard: Skulduggery check. If successful, he may select one enemy within Short range, plus one additional target per :success:, to suffer 4 Wounds. After resolving this, Dengar may perform a Move maneuver as an incidental.

gear: Modified heavy battle armour (+1 Defence, +2 Soak), Built-in comlink, Survival pack

abilities.name: Additional Limbs
abilities.description: Gain an additional free maneuver per turn, though may not perform more than 2 per turn.

abilities.name: Hoverer (Derrown)
abilities.description: Derrown may hover slightly off of the ground. When hovering, he does not have to spend additional maneuvers when navigating difficult terrain.

abilities.name: Electric Field
abilities.description: As an action, when engaged with an energy shield, Derrown may suffer 4 strain to make a :hard: Resilience check. On success, he may completely bypass the energy shield.

abilities.name: Improvised Transport
abilities.description: As a maneuver, Embo may convert his Kyuzo helmet into a Silhouette 1, Speed 2, Handling 0, System Strain Threshold 3 vehicle that can only operate on the ground and requires Piloting (Planetary) (:proficiency::proficiency::ability::ability:) to use. While using it in this way, Embo may not use the helmet’s weapon profiles and does not benefit from its Defensive or Deflection item qualities.

weapons.name: Kyuzo helmet (thrown)
weapons.notes: May spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: to recover helmet from ricochet.

abilities.name: Can’t Stand The Heat
abilities.description: Once per session Greedo may, as an action, roll a :daunting: Skulduggery or Streetwise check. If he succeeds, he immediately escapes the current encounter.

abilities.name: Distracting Quip
abilities.description: Once per encounter as an action, may make a :hard: Deception check. Each :success: gives Hondo +1 ranged and melee defence for the next two rounds.

abilities.name: Weequay Pheromones
abilities.description: Weequay may communicate with other Weequay using pheromones if they are within Short range of each other.

abilities.name: Delicate Information
abilities.description: Once per session, Ziro may spend a Destiny Point to reveal he possesses valuable blackmail material on any character in the encounter.

abilities.name: Ponderous
abilities.character: Ziro the Hutt, Geonosian Queen, Hydroid Medusa
abilities.description: Can never spend more than one maneuver moving per turn.

weapons.name: Smoke grenade
weapons.notes: Creates a thick black smoke that engulfs the target and anyone in Short range, adding :setback::setback::setback: to all Perception and Vigilance checks.

name: Moralo Eval

abilities.name: Criminal Mastermind
abilities.description: Eval uses Cunning for Negotiation and Underworld checks.

gear: 2 Frag grenades, Modified armour (+1 Defence, +2 Soak)

name: Pyke Leader

abilities.name: Ride The High
abilities.description: Once per session as an action, a Pyke Leader may use a single dose of Kessel Boost adrenaline to upgrade all combat checks once for the remainder of the encounter.

gear: Pyke armoured robes (+2 Soak), (4) Kessel Boost spice dose

name: Robonino
gear: Light utility armour (+2 Soak), Datapad, Slicer’s tools

abilities.name: Power Suit
abilities.description: Once per session, Seripas may spend :triumph: or :advantage::advantage::advantage: on a successful Ranged (Heavy) check to add the Breach 1 quality to the attack.

abilities.name: Knife Master
abilities.description: Whenever Sugi throws her vibroknife, it gains the Accurate 2 quality.

abilities.name: The Show Goes On
abilities.description: Whenever Sy Snootles is performing a song, allies gain :boost::boost::boost: on Stealth and Skulduggery checks against audience members.

name: Todo 360

abilities.name: Techno Service Droid
abilities.description: Once per session, Todo 360 may upgrade his next Computers check once as an incidental.

gear: Integrated slicer’s tools, Built-in encrypted comlink, Droid chassis (+1 Soak)

abilities.name: Force Power: Bind
abilities.description: Dooku may spend :forcepip: to immobilise a target within Short range until the end of his next turn. If Dooku used :darkside: to generate :forcepip:, the target also suffers 1 wound per :forcepip: spent on the check, ignoring soak. May spend :forcepip::forcepip: to add up to two additional targets.

abilities.name: Force Power: Enhance
abilities.description: When making an Athletics, Coordination or Resilience check, the character may roll an Enhance power check as part of the pool and may spend :forcepip: to gain :success: or :advantage: (their choice) on the check. May make an Enhance power check as a maneuver to spend :forcepip: to leap to any location within Short range, or :forcepip::forcepip: to leap to any location within Medium range.

abilities.name: Force Power: Move
abilities.description: The character can hurl objects by making a Move power check and rolling a ranged attack as part of the pool. The attack’s difficulty is equal to the silhouette of the object being thrown (default is silhouette 0) and only succeeds if they can also spend enough :forcepip: to move the object. The attack deals damage equal to the object’s silhouette times 10 (silhouette 0 deals 5 damage) plus 1 per net :success:. To throw multiple objects, they must generate enough :forcepip: to move multiple objects, and must use rules for Auto-Fire to determine difficulty and targeting.

abilities.name: Force Power: Protect
abilities.description: Dooku may make an :average: Discipline check as part of a Protect power check. May spend :forcepip::forcepip: to reduce damage from an energy weapon that hits Dooku by 4 plus 1 per net :success:.

abilities.name: Force Power: Sense
abilities.description: The character may spend :forcepip: to sense all living things within Short range (including animals and sentient beings) and may spend :forcepip::forcepip: to increase the range of this effect to Medium. The character may instead spend :forcepip: to sense the current emotional state of one living target they are engaged with.

abilities.name: Force Power: Unleash
abilities.description: Dooku may make an :average: Discipline check as part of an Unleash power check. May spend :forcepip::forcepip: to make an attack dealing 4 damage plus 1 per net :success:, with a critical rating of 4, to a target at Short range. May spend :forcepip: to add 3 damage to the attack, or :advantage: to inflict 1 strain on the target.

abilities.name: Infiltrate And Execute
abilities.description: May impersonate a known enemy’s voice to gain :boost::boost: on all Deception checks, but upgrades the difficulty once if also attempting to maintain a physical disguise (such as wearing an enemy uniform).

abilities.name: Disguise Mode
abilities.description: As a maneuver, may transform into the appearance of an innocent sweeper droid. If no enemies witness the transformation, the droid immediately gains Deception 3 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:) as a skill.

abilities.name: Self Destruct
abilities.description: As a maneuver, may transform into a ticking bomb. In this mode, the droid may not move, communicate or use its integrated blasters. As an action, it may detonate using the Self Destruct weapon profile. This instantly destroys the droid.

abilities.name: Lancer
abilities.description: When piloting a swoop and crossing from Long to Engaged range in a single turn to attack a target, the IG combat lance gains the Breach 1 quality for that turn.

abilities.name: Lumbering
abilities.description: May only make one Move maneuver per turn and may not take the Aim maneuver.

abilities.name: Regeneration (Durge)
abilities.description: When recovering from wounds via natural rest or in a bacta tank, recover 1 additional Wound. First-aid, medical treatment, and stimpacks do not result in recovery from an additional wound. Durge can regrow lost limbs.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.description: At the end of each round, Durge makes a :daunting: Resilience check to recover wounds equal to :success:.

abilities.name: Rocket Pack
abilities.description: Allows Teska to function as a Silhouette 1, Speed 2, Handling 0, System Strain Threshold 6 vehicle that requires Piloting (Planetary) (:proficiency::proficiency::proficiency:) to operate.

name: Lux Bonteri
gear: Upper class clothing (+1 Soak), or padded armour (+2 Soak)

abilities.name: Diplomatic Solution
abilities.description: Once per session, at the GM’s discretion, when a combat encounter against one or more sentient creatures is about to begin, Mina Bonteri may spend a Destiny Point and make a :daunting: Charm check to turn the encounter into a social encounter instead.

abilities.name: Getting Results
abilities.description: When accompanied by armed guards, Gunray gains Coercion 2 (:proficiency::proficiency::ability:) for as long as they are within Short range.

abilities.name: Neimoidian Courage
abilities.description: When all allied NPCs protecting this Neimoidian have been defeated, they must make a :hard: Discipline check. If they fail, they surrender unconditionally.

abilities.name: Shoot Them Or Something!
abilities.description: Once per encounter, Gunray may nominate an enemy combatant as a primary target. All allies gain :boost: on attacks made against the target.

abilities.name: Clever But Crazy
abilities.description: Dr Vindi may suffer 3 strain to make a skill check using Intellect instead of the characteristic associated with the skill.

weapons.name: Bio-virus grenade
weapons.notes: All targets suffering at least 1 Wound, or are within Medium range without environmental protection, must make a :formidable: Resilience check. Target suffers 2 Wounds and 2 Strain per :threat: and a Vicious 5 Critical Injury if the check is failed. :despair: means they must make the check again at the the start of the next turn.

abilities.name: Hound Master
abilities.description: May spend a maneuver to direct any trained beast within Medium range. The beast may perform an immediate free maneuver or add :boost: to their next skill check.

abilities.name: Temper Tantrum
abilities.description: When Sobeck fails a combat check he suffers 1 strain but gains 1 automatic :success: on his next attack against the same target, so long as he attacks them on his next consecutive turn.

abilities.name: Flyer
abilities.description: This creature can fly.

abilities.name: Geonosian Valour
abilities.description: May perform a maneuver to cause all ranged attacks targeting the character to instead hit one ally or helpless enemy in Engaged range, until the beginning of the character’s next turn.

name: Riff Tamson
gear: 4 Karkarodon grenades, Aquatic assault suit (+1 Defence, +2 Soak)

abilities.name: Duplicitous
abilities.description: Once per session as an action, Clovis may make a :hard: Charm or Deception check. On success, he cannot be a target of combat checks until the end of the encounter or until making a combat check himself.

name: Separatist Commander

abilities.name: Concentrate Your Fire!
abilities.description: May perform a maneuver to direct one allied minion group within Medium range; the group may perform an immediate free combat check action.

gear: Armoured uniform (+1 Defence, +2 Soak), Encrypted comlink

abilities.name: Blademaster
abilities.description: Sora Bulq does not increase difficulty when making attacks with two weapons.

abilities.name: Force Power: Bind
abilities.description: Bulq may spend :forcepip: to immobilise a target within Short range until the end of his next turn. If Bulq used :darkside: to generate :forcepip:, the target also suffers 1 wound per :forcepip: spent on the check, ignoring soak.

The attack deals damage equal to the object’s silhouette times 10 (silhouette 0 deals 5 damage) plus 1 per net :success:. To throw multiple objects, they must generate enough :forcepip: to move multiple objects, and must use rules for Auto-Fire to determine difficulty and targeting.

name: Wat Tambor

abilities.name: Methane Breather
abilities.description: Requires methane to live and must wear a special pressure suit. Treats standard planetary air pressure and composition as a corrosive atmosphere with rating 6.

abilities.name: Sudden Leverage
abilities.description: Once per session, Wat Tambor may spend a Destiny Point to produce a piece of highly incriminating information about another character in the encounter. This information can be genuine, or a very high quality counterfeit, at the GM’s discretion.

gear: Skakoan pressure suit (+2 Soak), Datapad, Encrypted comlink
